summary: This document outlines the responsibilities and delegation of authority within a committee related to reputational risk at Deutsche Bank. It details the roles of the Chairperson and Vice-chairperson, as well as the delegation of tasks to sub-committees or individuals, although currently no responsibilities are delegated.

persons.name: DWS USA Risk Advisor
persons.context: Acts as Chairperson of the Committee overseeing reputational risk.

persons.name: Chief Operating Officer Americas
persons.context: Serves as Vice-chairperson of the Committee and assumes responsibilities in the Chairperson's absence.

persons.name: Chief Risk Officer Americas
persons.context: Delegated the role of Chairperson for the Americas Reputational Risk Committee to the DWS USA Risk Advisor on an interim basis.

keyFacts: The document discusses the delegation of authority within a reputational risk committee at Deutsche Bank.
The DWS USA Risk Advisor is currently acting as Chairperson of the Committee.
The Chief Operating Officer Americas serves as Vice-chairperson.
No responsibilities are currently delegated to sub-committees or individual position holders.
